trans-unit.source: Create a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to create a workspace for Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: How to create a workspace for Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: Create an Azure Machine Learning workspace
trans-unit.target: Create an Azure Machine Learning workspace

trans-unit.source: This menu links to topics that describe how to set up the various data science environments used by the Cortana Analytics Process (CAPS).
trans-unit.target: This menu links to topics that describe how to set up the various data science environments used by the Cortana Analytics Process (CAPS).

trans-unit.source: To use Azure Machine Learning Studio, you need to have a Machine Learning workspace.
trans-unit.target: To use Azure Machine Learning Studio, you need to have a Machine Learning workspace.

trans-unit.source: This workspace contains the tools you need to create, manage, and publish experiments.
trans-unit.target: This workspace contains the tools you need to create, manage, and publish experiments.

trans-unit.source: To create a workspace
trans-unit.target: To create a workspace

trans-unit.source: Sign-in to the [Microsoft Azure classic portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Sign-in to the [Microsoft Azure classic portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure services panel, click **MACHINE LEARNING**.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure services panel, click **MACHINE LEARNING**.

trans-unit.source: ![Machine Learning service][1]
trans-unit.target: ![Machine Learning service][1]

trans-unit.source: Click **+NEW** at the bottom of the window.
trans-unit.target: Click **+NEW** at the bottom of the window.

trans-unit.source: Click **DATA SERVICES**, then **MACHINE LEARNING**, then **QUICK CREATE**.
trans-unit.target: Click **DATA SERVICES**, then **MACHINE LEARNING**, then **QUICK CREATE**.

trans-unit.source: ![Quick Create of new workspace][3]
trans-unit.target: ![Quick Create of new workspace][3]

trans-unit.source: Enter a **WORKSPACE NAME** for your workspace and specify the **WORKSPACE OWNER**.
trans-unit.target: Enter a **WORKSPACE NAME** for your workspace and specify the **WORKSPACE OWNER**.

trans-unit.source: The workspace owner must be a valid Microsoft account (e.g., name@outlook.com).
trans-unit.target: The workspace owner must be a valid Microsoft account (e.g., name@outlook.com).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Later, you can share the experiments you're working on by inviting others to your workspace.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Later, you can share the experiments you're working on by inviting others to your workspace.

trans-unit.source: You can do this in Machine Learning Studio on the **SETTINGS** page.
trans-unit.target: You can do this in Machine Learning Studio on the **SETTINGS** page.

trans-unit.source: You just need the Microsoft account or organizational account for each user.
trans-unit.target: You just need the Microsoft account or organizational account for each user.

trans-unit.source: Specify the Azure **LOCATION**, then enter an existing Azure **STORAGE ACCOUNT** or select **Create a new storage account** to create a new one.
trans-unit.target: Specify the Azure **LOCATION**, then enter an existing Azure **STORAGE ACCOUNT** or select **Create a new storage account** to create a new one.

trans-unit.source: Click **CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE**.
trans-unit.target: Click **CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE**.

trans-unit.source: After your Machine Learning workspace is created, you will see it listed on the **machine learning** page.
trans-unit.target: After your Machine Learning workspace is created, you will see it listed on the **machine learning** page.

trans-unit.source: For information about managing your workspace, see [Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace].
trans-unit.target: For information about managing your workspace, see [Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace].

trans-unit.source: If you encounter a problem creating your workspace, see [Troubleshooting guide: Create and connect to an Machine Learning workspace].
trans-unit.target: If you encounter a problem creating your workspace, see [Troubleshooting guide: Create and connect to an Machine Learning workspace].

trans-unit.source: [To create a workspace]: #createworkspace
trans-unit.target: [To create a workspace]: #createworkspace
